Akụkọ, Akụkọ bụ akwụkwọ ụmụzi ederede na-esere onyinyo nke Gail E
Haley dere ma gosipụta nke na'akụkọ Afrịka banyere otu onye aghụghọ Anansi jé nweta akụkọ site na Chukwu Eluigwe iji nye ụmụ nke ụwa
E mepụtara akwụkwọ ahụ mgbe Gail E
Haley nọrọ otu afọ na Caribbean na-eme nchọpụta banyere mgbọrọgwụ Afrịka nke ọtụtụ akụkọ Caribbean
Atheneum wepụtara akwụkwọ,  bụ onye natara Caldecott Medal maka ihe osise na 1971.

Onye na-eme ihe nkiri bụ Gene Deitch mere akwụkwọ ahụ maka Weston Woods Studios na 197¹1. Emere ihe nkiri ahụ na Kratky Film Prague, na akụkọ nke Dr John Akar na "egwú Afrịka nke e mepụtara" site na Dr Vaclav Kubica site n'iji ngwá egwu Afríku gbazitere na Náprstek Museum Prague.
